real natural language training data.from sentence: In this work we seek to directly address the lack of real natural language training data by introducing a novel approach to building a supervised reading comprehension data set .

readily converted.using: simple entity detection and anonymisation algorithms

summary and paraphrase sentences.from sentence: We observe that summary and paraphrase sentences , with their associated documents , can be readily converted to context - query - answer triples using simple entity detection and anonymisation algorithms .

two new corpora.from sentence: Using this approach we have collected two new corpora of roughly a million news stories with associated queries from the CNN and Daily Mail websites .

efficacy.from sentence: We demonstrate the efficacy of our new corpora by building novel deep learning models for reading comprehension .
